tool_description: Optimizes maintenance schedules by grouping compatible services, minimizing downtime, and considering seasonal factors.

max_service_gap_days.description: Maximum days services can be moved for grouping (1-30)

seasonal_preferences.description: Consider seasonal timing for certain services

service_capacity_per_day.description: Maximum number of services that can be done in one day

error_messages: Invalid schedule format: Schedules must contain properly formatted maintenance items.
Unsupported optimization goal: Use one of [cost, time, convenience].
Invalid service gap: Maximum gap must be between 1 and 30 days.
Invalid service capacity: Must be between 1 and 10 services per day.
Optimization failed: Unable to create optimized schedule due to conflicting constraints.
usage: Provide maintenance schedules and optimization preferences. The tool reorganizes services to minimize costs, time, or maximize convenience.

grouped_services.description: Services that were successfully grouped together

optimization_savings.description: Summary of savings achieved through optimization

total_service_days.description: Total number of service days required after optimization
